channel.title: Quasar (melo. release) - TOMii [chill / ambient] :soundcloud:
channel.description:
Hey all! For those who didn't hear before, the label [melo.](https://soundcloud.com/melolabel) is being reborn today. As one of the hallmarks of a lot of people's musical development in the Auxy community, I was sad to see it go but even happier to be able to bring it back courtesy of @anon73773654.
So without further ado, I'm very excited to present melo.'s renaissance release; **quasar by @Toveii**.
Make sure to give him some love, and feel free to contact me if you're interested in releasing. :smile:
https://soundcloud.com/melolabel/tomii-quasar
![image|501x500](upload://yzPRqiVyb4THj1w9eAh8PyPyQKM.jpeg)
Discover more TOMii: SoundCloud: @[tomii_music](https://soundcloud.com/tomii_music) Instagram: [www.instagram.com/tomii_auxy](https://exit.sc/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.instagram.com%2Ftomii_auxy) Youtube: [www.youtube.com/channel/UCdGO4ceCR1fk3lMxZjyoZUQ](https://exit.sc/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fchannel%2FUCdGO4ceCR1fk3lMxZjyoZUQ)
Discover more melo.: SoundCloud: @[melolabel](https://soundcloud.com/melolabel)

item.description:
Hey all! For those who didn’t hear before, the label melo. is being reborn today. As one of the hallmarks of a lot of people’s musical development in the Auxy community, I was sad to see it go but even happier to be able to bring it back courtesy of @anon73773654.

So without further ado, I’m very excited to present melo.'s renaissance release; quasar by @Toveii.

Make sure to give him some love, and feel free to contact me if you’re interested in releasing.
